item.description:
Level 1 - Open to all types of kayaks - Within the Charles River

Level 2 - Open to Sea Kayaks or Rec. Kayaks with bulkheads - Those folks going through the Locks into Boston Harbor

Click picture on right for an ariel view of launch site

Launch Site is at the old MDC Pool parking lot off of ~733 Memorial Drive Cambridge MA next to the Riverside Rowing/Boat Club. We'll then paddle down the Charles River towards Boston Harbor. The voyage will take us past Boston University, MIT, through the Esplanade ponds, past the Museum of Science and under the Zakim Bridge. For those who want to continue we'll go through the locks and into Boston Harbor. Our goal will be to paddle to the Barking Crab Restaurant for lunch so bring some cash if you want to dine or pack a lunch.

NOTE: Due to the large anticipated turnout for this event we encourage you to go to the alternative launch site at Artesani Park 1234 Soldiers field Rd. Brighton, MA. This is the launch site of the previous Charles River Paddle. There are 4 parking areas #4 marked Theater is the large Parking area with bathrooms thats where we'll launch from, its also close to the water. Meeting time at Artesani Park prior to 10:30am.

See directions link below.

Directions to Artesani Park 1234 Soldiers Field Rd. Brighton, MA

Distances: Put-In to Zakim Bridge & back Approx. 7 Miles Round-Trip
Put-In to Barking Crab Restaurant & back Approx. 11 Miles RT

For those planning to go to the Barking Crab, plan on this event lasting a minimum of 6hrs.
item.how_to_find_us: Small parking area, will be easy to find the group.
item.name: NE Seacoast Paddlers - Charles River/Boston Harbor Paddle #2
